Key Match Events: Kevin Durant led the Suns with 32 points
Jusuf Nurkic turned in a commanding performance with 20 points and 18 rebounds
Durant’s clutch jumper from the free-throw line with just 16 seconds left sealed a four-point cushion for Phoenix
Tyler Herro stood out for the Heat with 28 points
Haywood Highsmith provided a strong boost off the bench with 19 points
Jimmy Butler contributed 15 points but struggled with efficiency, going just 5-for-21 from the field
Bam Adebayo recorded a double-double with 12 points and 12 rebounds
Miami’s attempt to set up a potential game-tying shot fizzled when Butler passed the ball to Herro, who was positioned out of bounds
Post-Match Reflections: Kevin Durant expressed pride in his team's effort after the comeback win
Erik Spoelstra highlighted the victory as a crucial step toward the championship
